sentence: But, in the 1970s, new arguments concerning Israel's past and the biblical texts challenged these views; these arguments can be found in Thomas L. Thompson ' s The Historicity of the Patriarchal Narratives (1974), and John Van Seters ' Abraham in History and Tradition (1975).
